questions.question_text: Which of the following is a PRIMARY consideration to protect against privacy violations when utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) driven business decisions?

choices.A: De-identifying the data to be analyzed
choices.D: Ensuring proper data sets are used to train the models
choices.B: Verifying the data subjects have consented to the processing

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Data protection laws and regulations, such as the GDPR, require that personal data be processed only if the data subjects have given their explicit consent.
D. Ensuring proper data sets are used to train the models

comments.content: B. Verifying the data subjects have consented to the processing

questions.question_text: To ensure effective management of an organization’s data privacy policy, senior leadership MUST define:

choices.D: the scope and responsibilities of the data owner.
choices.C: metrics and outcomes recommended by external agencies.
choices.A: training and testing requirements for employees handling personal data.
choices.B: roles and responsibilities of the person with oversight.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
primary consideration is to define roles and responsibilities
D. the scope and responsibilities of the data owner.

questions.question_text: Which of the following BEST ensures data confidentiality across databases?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Data anonymization is a process used to remove or obscure personally identifiable information (PII) or sensitive data so that individuals or sensitive records cannot be identified. Think Encryption = Confidentiality

Selected Answer: A
A. Private key exposure

questions.question_text: Which of the following vulnerabilities would have the GREATEST impact on the privacy of information?

Data collected by a third-party vendor and provided back to the organization may not be protected according to the organization’s privacy notice. Which of the following is the BEST way to address this concern?

choices.B: Obtain independent assurance of current practices.

discussion.content: Validation of the contract compliance is the correct answer, The Service level agreement outlines the compliance status by the third party. The organization should be keen to ensure that the contract clearly outlines the status such as registration as a data processor or controller which is the basic level of compliance for any organization conscious about data protection.
